actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish an art bank in the Congress for the purpose of selecting American works of art for display in the House and Senate office buildings.

summary.text: Establishes an art bank in the Congress for the purpose of selecting American works of art for display in the House and Senate Office Buildings. Requires the board responsible for the administration of the art bank to compensate artists for loss, damage, or theft of such works of art. Authorizes the board to accept and expend any monies contributed to the art bank. Prohibits any person from receiving compensation for the display of any work of art created by such person and displayed under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish an art bank in the Congress for the purpose of selecting American works of art for display in the House and Senate office buildings.
